# From https://git.gnome.org/browse/librsvg/plain/rsvg-convert.c, LGPL
SET(TARGET_NAME "rsvg-convert")
IF(RSVG_FOUND AND PANGO_FOUND AND CAIRO_FOUND)
        INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES( ${RSVG_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${CAIRO_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${PANGO_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${LIBXML2_INCLUDE_DIR})

	FILE(GLOB ${TARGET_NAME}_SRCS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.c)
	FILE(GLOB ${TARGET_NAME}_HDRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.h)

	ADD_LIBRARY(${TARGET_NAME} ${${TARGET_NAME}_SRCS} ${${TARGET_NAME}_HDRS})
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${TARGET_NAME} ${RSVG_LIBRARIES})

	SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${TARGET_NAME} PROPERTIES FOLDER "${FOLDERNAME}")
	MESSAGE("[X] ${TARGET_NAME}")
ELSE()
	MESSAGE("[ ] ${TARGET_NAME}")
ENDIF()
